textAfterTable: 1. Re: Evening Consolidation May 31, 2012, 02:47 Fantaz   "...Also, the reaction when the audience sees the Wii U logo is too rich to be fake. You can't cue that kind of enthusiasm from gamers, we're too lazy to pretend to be that excited about something unless we're paid lots of money *cough*like them*cough*." What a bunch of crap... their reaction looks fake. "Ohh, thank you!" Bullshit, waste of time and the video doesn't even show anything.
